Title: Bombshells
Plot: Tension reaches new heights when Cuddy faces sobering news that propels her to reevaluate her priorities. While House is distracted by his concern for Cuddy?s well-being, the team treats a teenage patient whose worsening symptoms and suspicious body scars indicate more than just physical illness. Sensing the teen?s troubled emotional and mental state, Taub turns to the patient?s personal life for clues and uncovers disturbing home videos that could put the lives of his peers in danger. Meanwhile
